summary: Manage session and viminfo like CodeWrite
name: sessmgr
description: Manages sessions and viminfo so that when you start vim in a particular directory (e.g. a "project"), then vim starts up with all the files and windows set the way they were last, including history and other settings.  Allows multiple named sessions in each project, including the ability to quickly and easily switch between them.
install_details: Put the file in your ..plugin.. directory.  Also, read the documentation at the end of the file.
